subject: Plus X 3 Pedal set with Base Plate Questions
description_text:
Hello,

I'm in the USA, and want to purchase the 3 pedal PLUS X pedal set with 
the base plate.

I can order from your website and the total is $284.28 plus around $12 
shipping and maybe plus tax with discount code SRC.

However, I can also order on your ebay store and the total is $279.26 
with free shipping plus tax.

It seems I should purchase these on your ebay store as it may be a bit 
cheaper.  Are there any advantages or disadvantages to ordering on your 
ebay store vs. your online store?

Thank you.

Brian Jones
US 502.262.0108

conversations.body_text: Hi Brian Jones,  If you're purchasing from our official Simsonn store, you can place an order directly. If stock is available in the US, it will be shipped from there, tax-free. Price differences across platforms are mainly due to varying commission structures.
